_sText:
FILENAME: de_villa_cocaina.bsp
FILESIZE: 10,2 MB
DATE RELEASED: 05.11.2006

CREDITS:
nearly everything - me
beta testing - Neo Nemesis
uploading - BigDog ;)

Introduction
Evertime when i was bored and had time (in the last months) I worked a little bit on this map.
The story may seems to be freaky, because this map was planned to be a HLÂ² SP-series.

Story
With the intention to "clean" their small town from a group of cocaine dealers and consumers,
some residents, camouflaged as an anti terror unit, have confiscated 3 tonnes of columbian cocaine and charged it with atrazin.
They thought, no one would dare to take a step into this haunted villa.
The cocaine dealers, formally known as "Terrorists", have to burn the poisoned cocaine,before the insane residents sell it. "
